Vanuatu

div.head: Legislation
div.p: The Archives Law (see Legislation and proceedures governing declassification of diplomatic archives, PDF) stipulates that all public archives of the age of fifteen years or overall archives deposited in the National Archives and that, subject certain stipulations, all archives deposited in the National Archives shall be available for public reference.
